title: Boca dos Namorados. Na
body: Mountain in the parish of Estreito de Câmara de Lobos and overlooking the pleasant site of Jardim da Serra, is the Pico dos Bodes, in whose vicinity is the Boca dos Namorados, which is one of the points in Madeira where the most beautiful and vast panoramas are seen. This place became well known because in the past, it was quite visited by nationals and foreigners.
